name: Space Anarchy
description:
Space thugs have overrun the Universe. Your mission is simple: Restore Order Notice: WebGL appears to be producing distorted in-game sounds or on occasions not playing music at all. The recommended way of playing the game is by downloading the suitable Desktop version (Windows or Mac) attached further below to fully enjoy it. This game is part of the course "Game Design and Development" by Michigan State University Implemented Modifications Design Modifications :
  • Creation of complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels
  • Addition of 2 additional levels and tied in a logical progression in your game
Aesthetic (Visual/Audio) Modifications:
  • Reskin the existing graphics of the player
  • Addition of additional significant and coherent graphical elements to the game, such as new enemies and environmental challenges
  • Updated sound effects in the game to improve the sound design of the game
Gameplay Modifications:
  • Addition of new enemies with their own behavior
  • Addition new obstacles and challenges
  • Modification of the in-game GUI
Not Implemented:
  • Respawning from a CheckPoint (Player will still respawn at the initial position at the start of the game)
  • Healing
Compensating for by increasing the Health and Lives system Credits: Astrophotography taken by Ananias Mameletzis Created by: George Bazoukis
